biotools.summary: Server which provides iterated loop matching and maximum weighted matching algorithms for pseudoknot containing RNA secondary structure prediction. Algorithms can apply thermodynamic and comparative information, and thus can be used for either aligned or individual sequences.

bioschemas.name: ILM
bioschemas.summary: Server which provides iterated loop matching and maximum weighted matching algorithms for pseudoknot containing RNA secondary structure prediction. Algorithms can apply thermodynamic and comparative information, and thus can be used for either aligned or individual sequences.
